title: Triple Double Neapolitan Oreo Cookie Review: Oreo Oration
description:
Think Triple Double Oreo Cookies were nuts? Meet the Triple Double Neapolitan and see it get the Oreo Oration review.

SUBSCRIBE / LIKE / SHARE

While you were living your life, Nabisco went crazy and made an army of Oreo cookies. Every Wednesday and Friday, Greg Miller tears open a new package and reviews a new version of Milk's Favorite Cookie. 

Subscribe so you don't miss a review. 

Leave your review of today's cookie as a video response.

Let us know what Oreo we should review next in the comments.

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Like Greg on Facebook: http://facebook.com/gameovergreggy

Our theme is "Game-A-Tron" off of Daemon Hatfield's album Colorbeam. Buy it on iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/colorbeam/id426986325

Thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

Mega-Thanks to Matt Gravish for making the Oreo Oration logo and intro.

chocolate cream you probably get the idea it's neopal uh of course every Oreo oration starts with the first look tear it open again very solid presentation all the Oreos are intact let's get a smell test I'm smelling a lot of the shortbread cookie again uh the sugar cookie taste I always talk about uh we we'll pull one of these bad boys out you never know where you're starting from there you go and there there it is triple triple double chocolate pink see if it's got I don't know if it's the berry blast I I imagine it is the same berry blast consistency of the pink we all know I'm a big fan let's see what we get I don't know about this one ladies and gentlemen taste obviously this is a taste test similar to the reg regular triple double uh all I'm tasting is the cookie really off the bat a lot of that shortbread white bread cookie which I like I like that shortbread sugar cookie but now it's a bit too much a bit too much shortbread sugar cookie oh the frostings are completely lost I

a lot of that shortbread white bread cookie which I like I like that shortbread sugar cookie but now it's a bit too much a bit too much shortbread sugar cookie oh the frostings are completely lost I guess there's a little bit of aftertaste of chocolate but it seems like that pink frosting is getting in there knocking it out I'm actually for my own edification I want to know if it's very blast nope it's not very blast we'll see how these pair with milk it's not it wasn't it wasn't bad it was just imagine what pink tastes like and that's what that was that's all it was like we're going to put pink in a cookie okay this what it's going to taste like all right of course milk paing we have to do the dunk test one two three see what we get out of this guy y same problems we've seen with the white cookie before the white Cookie doesn't take the milk that well so it's still very crunchy same problem as the last triple double where you bit into it and it was just all Cookie uh you know a

white cookie before the white Cookie doesn't take the milk that well so it's still very crunchy same problem as the last triple double where you bit into it and it was just all Cookie uh you know a little bit of soggy on the outside but again the white Cookie doesn't take the Soggy at all it's it's no good I'm not not I'm not feeling this at all we'll do the twisting test because this is how you do it on or oration but is nothing's going to save this cookie well that's weird look at that I didn't even realize they you get an Oreo indentation there and there that cookie well that's interesting at least I found something else out in this cookie time to review this bastard um H I'd say 55 mediocre it's it's it's all right I wouldn't buy this cookie again you have to be a big shortbread fan shortbread cookie fan to get it and that's all you want but I don't like the aftertaste it's too sweet the pink is just pink you can't taste the chocolate ever actually yeah so I'm saying a lot of bad
